titlestmt.titleproper: A Guide to the Nelson A. Rockefeller photographs FA1604

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2020-09-12 16:50:06 -0400.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Consists of photographs, slides, prints, contact sheets, albums and negatives.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research with select materials restricted as noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC. Researchers interested in accessing digital media (floppy disks, CDs, DVDs, etc.) or audiovisual material (audio cassettes, VHS, etc.) in this collection must use an access surrogate. The original items may not be accessed because of preservation concerns. To request an access surrogate be made, or if you are unsure if there is an access surrogate, please contact an archivist.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Information regarding the Rockefeller Archive Center's preferred elements and forms of citation can be found at http://www.rockarch.org/research/citations.php

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The Nelson A. Rockefeller photographs collection is arranged in the following open series:

Series 1008: Nelson A. Rockefeller family (FA454). Series 2: Room 5600, Rockefeller family office (FA455) Series 3: Gubernatorial Press Office (FA456) Series 4: Gubernatorial Press Office (FA457) Series 5: Gubernatorial, Robert A. (Bob) Wands (FA458) Series 6: Vice Presidential (FA459) Series 7: Unprocessed photographs (FA460)
